long_description:
This dark, narrow, L-Shaped corridor is covered in dust and cobwebs on the ceilings and floor.  There are several piles of skeletons along the walls.  There seems to be a shiny object underneath the pile on the east most end, but will require some digging.

There is a door on the west end of the corridor.  There is a doorway on the east end of the corridor.
short_description:
Corridor with piles of skeletons, containing a shiny object beneath them.  There is also a lantern in the middle of the hall.
There is a door(exit) on west and doorway(exit) on east end of the corridor.
